coloredTexts.text: My grandfather told me that there are monstrous blind creatures in the oceans.Their teeth are so sharp that they can be used to create a Trident.
Don't ever try to eat a Pufferfish, they are poisonous!
Wow, it suddenly smells very fishy in here. Oh, hello there!
Void worm? What am I supposed to fish with this?
If I'm not fishing, I'm thinking about it.
The other day I catch a glowing book. I throw it back.
Watch out for the big kraken. They say it is imposing and terrifying.
